title: The God Nod
description: God sees something amazing in you (even when you don’t see it yourself). In “The God Nod,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church warns us not to let the things on the surface keep us from seeing our deeper purpose within.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: God sees something amazing in you (even when you don’t see it yourself). In “The God Nod,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church warns us not to let the things on the surface keep us from seeing our deeper purpose within.
